title: Spotify Clone Website
description: A responsive Spotify clone built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. Features include a sleek UI, music player controls, and dynamic elements for a seamless experience.

title: Rock-Paper-Scissors Game
description: A simple yet interactive Rock-Paper-Scissors game built using JavaScript. The game lets users play against the computer with real-time score updates and animations.

title: Stopwatch Application
description: A fully functional stopwatch built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include start, stop, reset, and lap functionality with an intuitive interface.

title: Number Guessing Game
description: A fun and engaging number guessing game developed using Python. The player must guess the correct number within a given range, with hints provided based on each guess.

title: E-Commerce Website
description: A dynamic and fully functional e-commerce website developed using Python and Django. Features include product listings, cart functionality, user authentication, and payment integration.

title: Easy-Job Portal
description: A job portal platform developed using Python and Django. Users can search for jobs, apply online, and companies can post vacancies with admin controls for managing users and listings.
